channel.title: ActionListener help
channel.description:
hello,
I'm currently make a reflection explorer who refresh the value of fields each 3-5 sec, but for the array it create a new button.
Each button have the same ActionListener, but I need to know the text of the button for do the action.
idk how to get the text, becose I'm add the button whit a array so I don't have is name... :confused:
thanx for help
Gabuuzz

item.title: ActionListener help
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“BAsh, post:14, topic:228366”][quote author=the bank link=topic=300263.msg2410932#msg2410932 date=1219930688]

What the hell.

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
String cmd = e.getActionCommand();
System.out.println("Pressed: " + cmd);
}
[/quote]Fixt.

gabuuzz, please learn more about the language before you attempt something like this.

oshit. I just realized gabuuzz was a person. Previous sarcastic comment withdrawn. Man I’m stupid…[/quote]Haha, it’s cool.

Read full topic

oshit. I just realized gabuuzz was a person. Previous sarcastic comment withdrawn. Man I’m stupid…[/quote]
It’s ok man.
I’m not realy sad LOL

I try the “ActionEvent.getActionCommand();”

EDIT: Cool it work(I wen’t rep++, but I can’t)
thanx

System.out.println("Pressed: " + cmd);
}
[/quote]Fixt.

gabuuzz, please learn more about the language before you attempt something like this.

I’m sorry, whats wrong with that?
[/quote]You have r.getActionCommand();

OMG I don’t know java as a result of this typo. Excuse me while I try to learn java in 24 hours.[/quote]Err, I simply corrected a mistake you made. I never said you didn’t know java…infact I didn’t even imply it.

item.title: ActionListener help
item.dc:creator: @gabuuzz gabuuzz
item.description:
@gabuuzz wrote:

I think i have found(think):
when I add the JButton I only need to add the ActionEvent to a HashMap<ActionEvent,String> and in the ActionListener I put “worm.getArray(hashmap.get(ActionEvent))”…

Do you think it will work?(all the button have the same ActionListener/ActionEvent so… :s)

Read full topic

item.title: ActionListener help
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“gabuuzz, post:1, topic:228366”]hello,

I’m currently make a reflection explorer who refresh the value of fields each 3-5 sec, but for the array it create a new button.

Each button have the same ActionListener, but I need to know the text of the button for do the action.

idk how to get the text, becose I’m add the button whit a array so I don’t have is name…

thanx for help

Gabuuzz[/quote]First of all, if you don’t know how to do this, then you shouldn’t be working with reflection.

Secondly, the fact you don’t know tells me you are probably using code from mine or ruler’s.

Thirdly, why not just use a separate listener for each button? If you knew anything about GUI design, you would not be asking this question.

Read full topic
